topic.title: Order replices in ascending chronological order?
topic.body:
Does anyone know how to order thread replies chronologically? 

Being used to forums and imageboards, you'd expect to follow the logical thread of the conversation rather than waiting religiously for new posts to pop up without your having to scroll down.

1565420657_1H3FjCmJSq5XgKKNUafDhdZh5WdQY.body:
That's a shame. Thanks for the reply.

>You can clone zerotalk and edit the post viewing order yourself.
This sounds neat but it's a lot more effort than I'm willing to make. Besides, will this cloned site be able to seamlessly interface with the original? That's far too much to read up on!

1565638003_1H79P7Dn1eqyVFFhsPux4ZyApMuhz.body: I can find peers but hit an error downloading content.json through Tor with Zeronet version 0.6.5-1.
